sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import eggImage from "../images/egg.png"; import fishImage from "../images/fish.png"; import chickenImage from "../images/chicken.png"; import fruitImage from "../images/fruit.png"; import vegitableImage from "../images/vegitable.png"; import riceImage from "../images/rice.png"; import meatImage from "../images/meat.png"; import spiceImage from "../images/spice.png"; const ProductCategories = () => { const [ads, setAds] = useState([]); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); // New state for message const handleClick = async (category) => { try { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/product-ads?category=${category}`); if (response.data.length === 0) { setMessage("No products available for this category."); } else { setMessage(""); // Clear message if ads are available } setAds(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching product ads:", error); setMessage("Error loading products. Please try again later."); } }; return (

Our Product Categories

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Purus faucibus massa dignissim tempus.

{/* Egg */}
handleClick("Egg")} >

Egg

{/* Fish */}
handleClick("Fish")} >

Fish

{/* Chicken */}
handleClick("Chicken")} >

Chicken

{/* Vegetables */}
handleClick("Vegetables")} >

Vegetables

{/* Fruits */}
handleClick("Fruits")} >

Fruits

{/* Rice */}
handleClick("Rice")} >

Rice

{/* Meat */}
handleClick("Meat")} >

Meat

{/* Spice */}
handleClick("Spice")} >

Spice

{/* Product Ads Display */}
{ads.map(ad => (

{ad.Product_Name}

Price: ${ad.Unit_Price} per {ad.Unit_Name}

Stock: {ad.Stock}

Minimum Order: {ad.Minimum_Order_Quantity}

Delivery Date: {ad.Delivery_Date}

{ad.Description}

))}
); }; export default ProductCategories;
